source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_STRATEGIC_DELIVERABLE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Strategic_Project_Deliverable]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_STRATEGIC_PROJECT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Strategic_Project]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as integer,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalStrategicProjectDeliverable
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalStrategicProjectDeliverable derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Deliverable,Project_Weighting,Expected_Completion_Date,Planned_Completion_Date,Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Project_ID = Project_ID,
		Relation_Deliverable = Deliverable,
		Relation_Project_Weighting = Project_Weighting,
		Relation_Expected_Completion_Date = Expected_Completion_Date,
		Relation_Planned_Completion_Date = Planned_Completion_Date,
		Relation_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndNumbers derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Deliverable,Project_Weighting,Expected_Completion_Date,Planned_Completion_Date,Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Project_ID == Relation_Project_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingStrategicDeliverable@NewDeliverable select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Expected_Completion_Date = toDate(Expected_Completion_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Planned_Completion_Date = toDate(Planned_Completion_Date, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Project_Weighting = toInteger(Project_Weighting),
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toInteger(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> ConvertDatesAndNumbers
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingStrategicDeliverable@(NewDeliverable, ChangedDeliverable, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingStrategicDeliverable@ChangedDeliverable derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Project_ID = Relation_Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as integer,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as integer,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Project_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalStrategicProject
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalStrategicProject derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Primary_Management_Activity,Project_Objectives,Expected_Value_Impact)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Project_ID = Project_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Primary_Management_Activity = Primary_Management_Activity,
		Relation_Project_Objectives = Project_Objectives,
		Relation_Expected_Value_Impact = Expected_Value_Impact,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
ConvertDatesAndID derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Primary_Management_Activity,Project_Objectives,Expected_Value_Impact)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Project_ID == Relation_Project_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingStrategicProject@NewStrategicProject select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
StagingDB derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period, "dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID)) ~> ConvertDatesAndID
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingStrategicProject@(NewStrategicProject, ChangedStrategicProject, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingStrategicProject@ChangedStrategicProject derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Project_ID = Relation_Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Project_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@ValidDateAndNumber, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndNumbers split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Project_Weighting)),not(isNull(Derived_Project_Weighting)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Expected_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Expected_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Planned_Completion_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Planned_Completion_Date)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),not(isNull(Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@(ValidDateAndNumber, InvalidDateOrNumber)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Derived_Project_Weighting = toShort(Project_Weighting),
		Derived_Expected_Completion_Date = toDate(Expected_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Planned_Completion_Date = toDate(Planned_Completion_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(Current_Progress_Perc_Complete)) ~> ConvertDateAndNumbers
InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrNumber
ValidatedDatesAndNumbers@InvalidDateOrNumber derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Project ID / Dates / Numbers")) ~> InvalidDateOrNumberErrormessage
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrNumber, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as string,
		Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedDateAndID@ValidDateAndID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Project_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDateAndID@(ValidDateAndID, InvalidDateOrID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrID
ValidatedDateAndID@InvalidDateOrID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Project ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIDErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
